definition: display of severity immediately on taking office/(fig.) initial show of strength
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
power/might/prestige

sentences.english: The drill sergeant begins by putting the fear of God up every new recruit .
sentences.chinese: 這個教練軍士一開始就給全體新兵一個下馬威。

sentences.english: Well the main is, I think to kick the Aristotelian tradition into touch.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這主要原因是給亞里士多德傳統一個下馬威。

sentences.english: The drill sergeant begins by putting the fear of God into every new recruit.
sentences.chinese: 這個教練中士一開始就給全體新兵一個下馬威。

sentences.english: Are you trying to psych me out ?
China challenging the US to a duel.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國對美國的一個下馬威。

definition: unexpected misfortune/unexpected accident/sudden death
the content of a conversation/words/remarks
to play dumb/to slack off (idiom)
to be determined to win (idiom)
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
aggressive/truculent/overbearing
sullen/to scowl miserably
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to turn pale with fright (idiom)
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
